snippet: The control of light is the core of the photographer Harold Ross's work. Mr. Ross, who has been "painting with light" for more than 20 years, pairs undeniably real scenes with the artificiality of lighting.
abstract: The control of light is the core of the photographer Harold Ross's work. Mr. Ross, who has been "painting with light" for more than 20 years, pairs undeniably real scenes with the artificiality of lighting.

byline.original: By FRED R. CONRAD and KERRI MACDONALD
